ingredients: 3 tablespoons butter, at room temperature,   +   1/4 cup brown sugar (such as muscovado), 4  fresh nectarines, sliced into bite-size pieces
nutrition: Total Fat 18g 22%, Saturated Fat 11g 53%, Cholesterol 80mg 27%, Sodium 265mg 12%, Total Carbohydrate 39g 14%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 18g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 3mg 15%, Calcium 47mg 4%, Iron 2mg 9%, Potassium 161mg 3%
